alert.note: Alert for Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:06PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Madison, central Beaverhead counties through 500 PM MDT... At 405 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 15 miles southeast of Dillon to 12 miles south of Alder. Movement was northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Virginia City, Ennis, Alder, Harrison, Pony, Norris, Mcallister, Jeffers, Laurin and Cameron. This includes Highway 287 between mile markers 35 and 76. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for south central and southwestern Montana.
